Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Stakeholders express their opinions on the Australian government's priorities. ACOSS shares an article by Ben Phillips on the upcoming budget and urges the government to #RaiseTheRate highlighting the importance of aiding financially vulnerable citizens. Another questions the government's priorities pointing out that billions are being spent on AUKUS submarines while the Welfare Report has just been released and the budget is looming questioning whether such lavish military spending is necessary. #auspol
